definitions: in a way that lacks discipline or restraint

examples.text: she was wildly enthusiastic about the food

shortDefinitions: in way that lacks discipline or restraint

definitions: in a way that indicates distraction or strong emotion

examples.text: he ran to us, staring wildly
his face is red, his arms gesticulating wildly

shortDefinitions: in way that indicates distraction or strong emotion

definitions: to a ridiculous or extreme degree

examples.text: he has a tendency to exaggerate wildly
oil prices have fluctuated wildly since May
